接口 SwingChessBoardDisplay

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SwingEuropeanChessDisplay, SwingXiangqiBoardDisplay

    public interface SwingChessBoardDisplay
    Rules for how we want the chess board to display
    作者:
    Harold Connamacher, Bruce Dong

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void displayEmptySquare(javax.swing.JButton button, int row, int column)
      Display a square that has no piece on it.
      void displayFilledSquare(javax.swing.JButton button, int row, int column, ChessPiece piece)
      Display a square that has a piece on it.
      default int getSquareSize()
      The initial size of a square on the chess board, initially 1/40 the width of the screen
      void highlightSquare(boolean highlight, javax.swing.JButton button, int row, int column, ChessPiece piece)
      Highlight a square of the board.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSquareSize

        default int getSquareSize()
        The initial size of a square on the chess board, initially 1/40 the width of the screen
        返回:
        the size of a square

      • displayEmptySquare

        void displayEmptySquare(javax.swing.JButton button,
                        int row,
                        int column)
        Display a square that has no piece on it.
        参数:
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board

      • displayFilledSquare

        void displayFilledSquare(javax.swing.JButton button,
                         int row,
                         int column,
                         ChessPiece piece)
        Display a square that has a piece on it.
        参数:
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board
        piece - the piece that is on this square

      • highlightSquare

        void highlightSquare(boolean highlight,
                     javax.swing.JButton button,
                     int row,
                     int column,
                     ChessPiece piece)
        Highlight a square of the board.
        参数:
        highlight - do we want the highlight on (true) or off (false)?
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board
        piece - the piece (if any) that is on this square
